00045 #endif
00046     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Internal error traces")

00050     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Traces about traces")
00051     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Traces du système de traces"));

00104 Traces::Traces(void)
00105   : m_mapClasses(MAX_TRACE_CLASS_COUNT),
00106     m_bTraceAll(false),
00107     m_pcliStream(NULL)
00108 {
00109     EnsureCommonDevices();
00110 
00111     // Register TRACE_TRACES.
00112     m_mapClasses.SetAt(TRACE_TRACES.GetName(), TraceClassFlag(TRACE_TRACES, m_bTraceAll));
00113 
00114     // Register INTERNAL_ERROR
00115     Declare(INTERNAL_ERROR); SetFilter(INTERNAL_ERROR, true);
00116 }
00117 
00118 Traces::~Traces(void)
00119 {
00120     // If the assertion below occures, you might call UnsetStream() before program termination.
00121     CLI_ASSERT(m_pcliStream == NULL);
00122 }
00123 
00124 const OutputDevice& Traces::GetStream(void) const
00125 {
00126     if (m_pcliStream != NULL)
00127     {
00128         return *m_pcliStream;
00129     }
00130     else
00131     {
00132         // Default to stderr.
00133         return OutputDevice::GetStdErr();
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 const bool Traces::UnsetStream(void)
00138 {
00139     if (cli::OutputDevice* const pcli_Stream = m_pcliStream)
00140     {
00141         bool b_Res = true;
00142 
00143         // Unreference the device right now.
00144         m_pcliStream = NULL;
00145         if (! pcli_Stream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00146         {
00147             b_Res = false;
00148         }
00149         pcli_Stream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00150 
00151         if (! b_Res)
00152         {
00153             // Abort on error
00154             return false;
00155         }
00156     }
00157 
00158     return true;
00159 }
00160 
00161 const bool Traces::SetStream(OutputDevice& CLI_Stream)
00162 {
00163     // Free previous reference.
00164     if (! UnsetStream())
00165     {
00166         return false;
00167     }
00168 
00169     // Store next reference.
00170     {
00171         CLI_Stream.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00172         if (! CLI_Stream.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00173         {
00174             // Store nothing on error.
00175             CLI_Stream.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00176             return false;
00177         }
00178         // Do not store the reference until opening is done.
00179         m_pcliStream = & CLI_Stream;
00180     }
00181 
00182     return true;
00183 }
00184 
00185 const bool Traces::Declare(const TraceClass& CLI_Class)
00186 {
00187     if (m_mapClasses.GetAt(CLI_Class.GetName()) != NULL)
00188     {
00189         // Already declared.
00190         // Nothing else to do.
00191         return true;
00192     }
00193     else
00194     {
00195         // Show this new trace class depending on the trace all configuration.
00196         const bool b_ShowTrace = m_bTraceAll;
00197 
00198         // Remember this new class.
00199         if (m_mapClasses.SetAt(CLI_Class.GetName(), TraceClassFlag(CLI_Class, b_ShowTrace)))
00200         {
00201             TraceFilterState(CLI_Class, b_ShowTrace);
00202             return true;
00203         }
00204         else
00205         {
00206             return false;
00207         }
00208     }
00209 }
00210 
00211 const TraceClass::List Traces::GetAllClasses(void) const
00212 {
00213     // Retrieve current filter.
00214     TraceClass::List q_Classes(MAX_TRACE_CLASS_COUNT);
00215     for (   ClassMap::Iterator it = m_mapClasses.GetIterator();
00216             m_mapClasses.IsValid(it);
00217             m_mapClasses.MoveNext(it))
00218     {
00219         if (! q_Classes.AddTail(m_mapClasses.GetAt(it)))
00220         {
00221             GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00222                 << "Traces::GetAllClasses(): "
00223                 << "Could not had '" << m_mapClasses.GetAt(it).GetName() << "' trace class "
00224                 << "to q_Classes"
00225                 << endl;
00226         }
00227     }
00228     return q_Classes;
00229 }
00230 
00231 const TraceClass::List Traces::GetCurrentFilter(void) const
00232 {
00233     // Retrieve current filter.
00234     TraceClass::List q_CurrentFilter(MAX_TRACE_CLASS_COUNT);
00235     for (   ClassMap::Iterator it = m_mapClasses.GetIterator();
00236             m_mapClasses.IsValid(it);
00237             m_mapClasses.MoveNext(it))
00238     {
00239         if (m_mapClasses.GetAt(it).IsVisible())
00240         {
00241             if (! q_CurrentFilter.AddTail(m_mapClasses.GetAt(it)))
00242             {
00243                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00244                     << "Traces::GetCurrentFilter(): "
00245                     << "Could not had '" << m_mapClasses.GetAt(it).GetName() << "' trace class "
00246                     << "to q_CurrentFilter"
00247                     << endl;
00248             }
00249         }
00250     }
00251     return q_CurrentFilter;
00252 }
00253 
00254 const bool Traces::SetFilter(const TraceClass& CLI_Class, const bool B_ShowTraces)
00255 {
00256     // Check the class exists.
00257     if (const TraceClassFlag* const pcli_Flags = m_mapClasses.GetAt(CLI_Class.GetName()))
00258     {
00259         if (pcli_Flags->IsVisible() != B_ShowTraces)
00260         {
00261             // Set the flag.
00262             m_mapClasses.SetAt(CLI_Class.GetName(), TraceClassFlag(*pcli_Flags, B_ShowTraces));
00263             TraceFilterState(CLI_Class, B_ShowTraces);
00264         }
00265         return true;
00266     }
00267 
00268     return false;
00269 }
00270 
00271 const bool Traces::SetAllFilter(const bool B_ShowTraces)
00272 {
00273     // Remember 'all filter configuration'.
00274     m_bTraceAll = B_ShowTraces;
00275     BeginTrace(TRACE_TRACES) << "All traces " << (B_ShowTraces ? "enabled" : "disabled") << endl;
00276 
00277     // Trace traces modifications.
00278     SetFilter(TRACE_TRACES, true);
00279 
00280     // Then adapt every filter configuration.
00281     for (   ClassMap::Iterator it = m_mapClasses.GetIterator();
00282             m_mapClasses.IsValid(it);
00283             m_mapClasses.MoveNext(it))
00284     {
00285         if (! SetFilter(m_mapClasses.GetAt(it), B_ShowTraces))
00286         {
00287             return false;
00288         }
00289     }
00290 
00291     // Set final traces settings.
00292     SetFilter(TRACE_TRACES, B_ShowTraces);
00293 
00294     return true;
00295 }
00296 
00297 const OutputDevice& Traces::Trace(const TraceClass& CLI_Class)
00298 {
00299     Declare(CLI_Class);
00300     bool b_ShowTrace = false;
00301 
00302     if (const TraceClassFlag* const pcli_Flags = m_mapClasses.GetAt(CLI_Class.GetName()))
00303     {
00304         b_ShowTrace = pcli_Flags->IsVisible();
00305     }
00306 
00307     if (b_ShowTrace)
00308     {
00309         return BeginTrace(CLI_Class);
00310     }
00311     else
00312     {
00313         return OutputDevice::GetNullDevice();
00314     }
00315 }
00316 
00317 const OutputDevice& Traces::BeginTrace(const TraceClass& CLI_Class)
00318 {
00319     return (GetStream() << "<" << CLI_Class.GetName() << "> ");
00320 }
00321 
00322 const bool Traces::TraceFilterState(const TraceClass& CLI_Class, const bool B_ShowTraces)
00323 {
00324     // Trace this new class state.
00325     (   (CLI_Class == TRACE_TRACES) ? BeginTrace(TRACE_TRACES) : Trace(TRACE_TRACES))
00326         << "Trace <" << CLI_Class.GetName() << "> "
00327         << "-> " << (B_ShowTraces ? "on" : "off") << endl;
00328 
00329     return true;
00330 }

00352 Traces::TraceClassFlag& Traces::TraceClassFlag::operator=(const Traces::TraceClassFlag& CLI_Class)

00355     m_bShow = CLI_Class.IsVisible();
00356     return *this;

00359 const bool Traces::TraceClassFlag::IsVisible(void) const

00362 }
